title: Board game Azul
descriptions:
Title: Azul Strategy Board Game

Description: Azul Board Game

* Manufacturer: Next Move Games
* Composition: High-grade Paper
* Motif: Artistic Patterns
* Category: Strategy & Family
* Player Count: 2 to 4 Participants

MASTER THE ART OF TILING: Engage in the delicate art of mosaic-making with the critically acclaimed board game, Azul.

THINK AHEAD: Employ strategic foresight to claim victory over your rivals and foil their tactics.

PREMIUM GAME PIECES: Delight in the durable, aesthetically pleasing components and ornate tiles that enhance your gaming experience.

ENJOY WITH EVERYONE: Designed to captivate players from young to old, Azul is the ideal choice for family gatherings and social events.

CRAFTED BY AN EXPERT: Brought to you by the esteemed board game designer Michael Riesling, ensuring a blend of innovation and engaging gameplay.

PREMIUM GAME PIECES: Play with confidence knowing that you're handling top-tier components and visually stunning tiles.

ALL-AGES ENTERTAINMENT: Azul is a family-friendly game, perfect for introducing a touch of strategy to your family's game nights.
